Name: Doorway Stretch
Description: Create a right angle with your elbow. Place the inside of your arm on a door frame and gently lean to feel a stretch in your anterior deltoid.

Name: Thread the Needle
Description: Lay down on your stomach and stretch your right arm underneath you, reaching as far left as you can while laying on your right arm to increase stretch intensity. Repeat with left arm.

Name: Childs Pose
Description: Kneel with your forehead as close to the ground as you can. Extend your arms out forward, leaning into the stretch
